ambassadors: Robinhood

Robinhood represents a modern technology platform in the FinTech space that embodies the values of accessibility and democratization of investing. It leverages technology to enable retail investors to trade stocks with ease, which aligns closely with the agenda of Technology Platforms in FinTech. Unlike other entities on the list, Robinhood is a specific platform that integrates technology directly with financial transactions, making it a fitting ambassador.
